title: Email painted over
content: I received an email, Thunderbird on my Windows 11 PC, that was heavily covered by an unknown solid black design. Most of the text was covered over. I was unable to remove the blockage. When I opened the same email on both my iPhone and my Yahoo mail account, there was no problem - no blockage. It looked somewhat like a large black mask laid over the text.
creator: amammini

title: Sound for Incoming Mail
content: Not a huge problem, but VERY FRUSTRATING! After years of reliable performance, my personalized incoming mail notification sound (wav format) suddenly stopped playing. The 'test' function in settings works fine, but NOTHING happens when actually downloading messages. I've tried EVERY possible FIX, but NO LUCK. Any suggestions? Thanks

title: email not loaded from server
content:
Hello, I use the Thunderbird to hanlde my 12 email accounts, and it has huge number of emails. My problem, nowadays the client cant download the new emails, many times. I use with Imap setting. If I restart, as "admin" the program, I can see the new emails, but I have to do it many times a day.

Do you have any suggestion, what to do ?

I cant decrase the numbers of the emails, and I like this program, I dont would like to change to other client....

Thanks Laszlo
creator: theimporttuning

title: Thunderbird not starting
content:
Last week Thunderbird did an automatic update, this is not unusual BUT since then every time I try to start Thunderbird A message comes up 

"Your computer needs to be restarted to complete a previous upgrade of Thunderbird. Do you want to reboot now? Yes No"

No mater how many times I allow the computer to restart Thunderbird never opens.

I like Thunderbird I is my preferred email reader and writer.
creator: rbrtgrdnr54
